Bill Gates did not say that 80: of people who took the Moderna vaccine experienced significant side effects.
A U: S. Food and Drug Administration report stated that only 0.5% of individuals who received the Moderna vaccine experienced a "severe adverse event."
Reports of: severe adverse events" associated with the Moderna vaccine are extremely rare.
The Facebook post claiming that: 80% of people taking the Moderna vaccine had significant side effects, via Bill Gates" is misleading and inaccurate.
